name: Tank-er
description:
The game is inspired by Pac-Man with the addition of the random map idea to make the game more interesting and exciting to play overall.

Players use ASDW to control their movements up, down, left, right and centre, eating as many bullets as possible and dodging other tanks.

Of course, you can also eat radar to strengthen yourself and for the next 5 seconds you will be invincible and can destroy other tanks.

If the player is touched by another tank then the game is lost, if the player picks up more than 40 rounds then the game is won.

It should be noted that the player can only drive on the streets, but enemy tanks can move regardless of the terrain. This also disguises the difficulty of the game.
